alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 23 at 4:22PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues as a new area of showers and thunderstorms approaches from the southeast. * WHERE...Portions of northern Arizona including areas near Chavez Mountain, Starlight Pines and the Guzzler Fire. * WHEN...Until 530 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in creeks and normally dry washes is imminent or occurring. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. Recent burn areas are prone to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 421 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Diablo, Canyon, Clear Creek, Sand Draw, Wallace Canyon, Willow Creek, Sawmill Wash, Anderson Canyon, West Clear Creek, Jacks Canyon, Chevelon Canyon, Wildcat Canyon, Yaeger Canyon, Grapevine Canyon, Yellow Jacket Canyon and West Chevelon Canyon. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.25 to 0.75 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Guzzler Fire Scar, Starlight Pines, Tremaine Lake, Chavez Mountain, Long Lake, Chevelon Butte and Chevelon Crossing Campground. - This includes the following highways... State Route 99 between mile markers 23 and 28. State Route 87 between mile markers 302 and 327. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Avoid recently burned areas and downstream locations. Life-threatening flooding of creeks, roads and normally dry washes will occur. Rockslides and mudslides will likely occur in steep terrain.
